const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "pattern_example",
  settings: {
    analysis: {
      tokenizer: {
        split_on_non_word: {
          type: "pattern",
          pattern: "\\W+",
        },
      },
      analyzer: {
        rebuilt_pattern: {
          tokenizer: "split_on_non_word",
          filter: ["lowercase"],
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
